arts.ttl: Carlisle secure second home win of the season with victory against Accrington
arts.sum: Kadeem Harris and Luke Armstrong scored for the Cumbrians.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United end 2024 with vital 2-1 victory against Accrington Stanley
arts.sum: GOALS from Kadeen Harris and Luke Armstrong helped Carlisle United secure a vital three points and under pressure Mike Williamson's first victory at Brunton Park as Blues boss.

arts.ttl: More fan photos from Carlisle United's Boxing Day game
arts.sum: Check out our second fans gallery from Carlisle United's Boxing Day defeat to Morecambe. Photos by Ben Holmes.

arts.ttl: In pictures: Carlisle United fans at the Morecambe game
arts.sum: Check out our first fans gallery from the Blues' Boxing Day defeat. Photos by Ben Holmes.

arts.ttl: 'I'm delighted to be here' - Will Patching's first words as a Carlisle United player
arts.sum: CARLISLE United's newest signing Will Patching has said that he is 'delighted' after signing a two-and-a-half-year contract at Brunton Park.

arts.ttl: Latest on injury and illness issues at struggling Carlisle United
arts.sum: Carlisle United frontman Georgie Kelly is awaiting the results of a scan amid fears of another injury lay-off for the striker.

arts.ttl: Jon Mellish's Boxing Day red card overturned by FA, Carlisle United confirm
arts.sum: JON Mellish's Boxing Day red card against Morecambe has been overturned by the FA, Carlisle United have confirmed.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United announce signing of midfielder Will Patching
arts.sum: CARLISLE United have announced the signing of midfielder Will Patching on a two-and-a-half-year contract.

arts.ttl: Grainger on Morecambe's 'massive' win over Carlisle United
arts.sum: Danny Grainger hailed Morecambe’s “massive" win at his former club as the Shrimps got the better of Carlisle United.

arts.ttl: Preview: Carlisle United vs. Accrington Stanley - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's League Two clash between Carlisle United and Accrington Stanley, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
